pages.text: $(bgreen)Flower Pot$() is a pot for planting. Yet he is also a plant. HAS YOUR MIND EXPLODED YET?$(br)$(byellow)Sun Cost$() : $(l)25$()$(br)$(bblue)Recharge$() : $(l)Huge Fast$()$(br)$(l)Features$() : It is a $(bred)block$() plant that can support plants place on every kind of solid block.
